item.title: About
item.description: âœ¿ For common questions about me or my work, please visit the FAQ. Hello, I’m Hobart. I’m an Australian illustrator and writer living and working in Tasmania. I like machines, midcentury design and visiting new places. I studied as a journalist, but now work in illustration. Vekllei has existed in some form since I was a kid, but I started working on it properly in 2017. You can follow my progress on this project on Twitter, or join my subreddit.
item.content:encoded:
âœ¿ For common questions about me or my work, please visit the FAQ.

Hello, I’m Hobart. I’m an Australian illustrator and writer living and working in Tasmania. I like machines, midcentury design and visiting new places. I studied as a journalist, but now work in illustration.

Vekllei has existed in some form since I was a kid, but I started working on it properly in 2017.

You can follow my progress on this project on Twitter, or join my subreddit.

You can write to me at ğŸ“§ hobart@millmint.net.

Visited: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¨

Sincere thanks to Jip and Ben R. R. for their contributions to this site. They volunteered their time again and again to help create new features that make Vekllei easier and more fun to read. Thank you!

News #

Last updated: 19 Apr 2023

April 2023

ğŸ“— April 18, 2023 New post: Atomic Main Battle Tank

ğŸŒ April 1, 2023 MillMint.net now displays a closeable notice and badge when there’s a new story you havent seen! Nifty!

ğŸŒ March 5, 2023 Added RSS to the site. Click her to follow Stories.

ğŸ“„ February 21, 2023 Added a Vekllei Timeline

ğŸŒ February 19, 2023 Added a DARK MODE to millmint.net. Debugged by Jip. Click the lightbulb at the top of the page!

ğŸ“„ December 20, 2022 Added an article about the Moshel St School

âœï¸ December 20, 2022 New blog post: Getting Back to Basics

ğŸ“’ December 10, 2022 New sketch: The Friend

November 2022

October 2022

ğŸ“’ October 29, 2022 New sketch: Tee Shirt

ğŸ“— October 26, 2022 New post: The Riot

ğŸŒ October 20, 2022 The Vekllei character creator has entered beta! Programming contributed and debugged by Jip, clothing assets by me. Go check it out at /dolls/!

ğŸ“— October 17, 2022 New post: Uniforms for All the Commonwealth

ğŸŒ October 15, 2022 Added the Vekllei Dictionary, a feature to show tooltips over Vekllei phrases and words (e.g. Bureau System). It’s a massive site upgrade, and once again it was contributed entirely by Jip in his free time. Thank you again!

ğŸ“— October 14, 2022 New post: Five Years

ğŸŒ October 7, 2022 Added a new floating dynamic TOC with active states, coded entirely by Jip. It looks fantastic and works great – thanks for your help!

ğŸ“— October 6, 2022 New post: The Rifles Section

September 2022

ğŸŒ September 29, 2022 New website section: Blog

ğŸ“— September 21, 2022 New post: The Scouts

ğŸŒ September 19, 2022 Made a huge update to the colour of the site, and fixed a lot of small nav bugs and inconsistencies that had been around for a while.

ğŸ“— September 16, 2022 New post: Lola, Borough of Genesisr

ğŸ“— September 15, 2022 New post: Story Trailer

ğŸ“— September 1, 2022 New post: Stories from the Horizon

August 2022

ğŸ“„ August 29, 2022 Added an article about the Finance of Vekllei

ğŸ“„ August 23, 2022 Added an article about the Metaphysics of Vekllei

ğŸŒ August 16, 2022 Painstakingly moved all 315 posts from /posts/ to /stories/, complete with custom aliases (e.g. millmint.net/stories/crown)

ğŸ“„ August 10, 2022 Added an article about the State Assets of Vekllei

ğŸ“— August 6, 2022 New post: The Crown and the Gi

ğŸ“— August 5, 2022 New post: Caught Sketching

ğŸ“— August 4, 2022 New post: Waiting for a Movie

ğŸŒ August 3, 2022 Added sidenotes! On wide screens, footnotes will now appear in the right margin of an article adjacent to footnoted sentences. A really nice improvement to readability. On mobile, they appear below an article as usual.

ğŸ““ August 2, 2022 Added a new /state/ section in /society/ and split up the Government article into smaller pages, in preparation for its public release.

July 2022

ğŸ“„ July 29, 2022 Added an article about Computing in Vekllei

ğŸŒ July 22, 2022 Added the first Studio Spotlight! A behind-the-scenes look at what goes into a post, accompanied by a timelapse. Visible below the School Cape post.

ğŸ“— July 22, 2022 New post: The Government School Cape

ğŸ“— July 21, 2022 New post: Little Hyderabad

ğŸŒ July 19, 2022 Overhauled the site colour system with Jip, who did an awesome job transforming my clunky CSS into javascript

ğŸ“— July 12, 2022 New post: CafÃ© Diplomacy

June 2022

ğŸ“„ July 29, 2022 New borough article: Pharos

ğŸŒ June 24, 2022 Added lazy-loading to images on the site, improving performance.

ğŸ“’ June 22, 2022 Drew a sketch of Tzipora and Cobian before their school formal. Just some fun between comic pages

ğŸŒ June 15, 2022 Added a swish animated cover for the home page, and moved the great existing parallax to Intro in preparation for an overhaul

ğŸ“’ June 7, 2022 Drew a uniform reference to keep clothing details consistent between chapters

ğŸŒ June 6, 2022 Added auto-numbering and anchors to the headers on the site for easier navigation

ğŸ“’ June 4, 2022 Drew a height reference sheet for the comic characters so I stop drawing Tzipora and Cobian the same height

ğŸ“’ June 2, 2022 Finished a Zelda reference sheet, now featuring eyelashes
